name: КАНДИДАТ
description:
КАНДИДАТ - This is a game where YOU are a presidential candidate, you have to defeat other candidates and get into the top 1 and become president.

In the game you expect Easter eggs and achievements
The game has a table of records, who will win?

КАНДИДАТ - This is an easy clicker where you have to make money for yourself, and with the help of them to promote your rating.
